text: The GTOs (Girls Together Outrageously) were an all-girl group from the Los Angeles area, specifically the Sunset Strip scene. They were active for only two and a half years (1968â€“1970) with a single reunion in 1974, their only album, Permanent Damage, produced by Frank Zappa, was released in 1969. ==References== Category:Musical groups from Los Angeles
title: The GTOs
